channel.title: Help With CentOS 5 VPS
channel.description:
I'm putting this here because it was a toss up between this section and the client section. I figured that this one is more read so I'd have a better chance. I installed Screen and JDK on the VPS. I uploaded my source. I typed "cd RuneBalance". Then, I typed: [code]screen -A -m -d -S RSPS java -classpath bin:deps/poi.jar:deps/mysql.jar:deps/RuneTopListV2.1.jar:deps/mina.jar:deps/slf4j.jar:deps/slf4j-nop.jar:deps/jython.jar:log4j-1.2.15.jar: server.Server[/code] After that, I went into my client and changed the IP to the VPS's IP address. I compiled and hit run. I tried to login but it stuck on a black screen and said, maybe a minute or so later, Connection Lost, Attempting to Reestablish. I did "free -m" on the VPS and have the control panel open so I can see that I'm running the source properly. What did I do wrong?
Source: Process-PK
If it's a bad source and client I'd be really dissappointed because I already added auto donation and auto highscores :/
Thanks for your help in advance.
PS. I'm not a total Linux newb. I switched to Ubuntu for like 3 months before reinstalling Windows because I was frustrated that I couldn't play my games and that if I used WINE the frames dropped. Thanks again.

item.description:
@DaGamerChild wrote:

It’s the Vindiction client, which is based off of the source’s original client. But I tried the old client anyway and it still had the same problem.

Read full topic
